title: Easy tomato soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, chopped coarsely', '6 garlic cloves, coarsely chopped', '1 tablespoon oregano', '2 bay leaves', '3 sprigs fresh thyme (or 1 tablespoon dried thyme)', '1 tablespoon dried basil', 'salt and black pepper to taste', 'sugar to taste', '2 (400g) tins peeled tomatoes', '1-2 tablespoons tomato puree (optional)', '500ml chicken stock', '150ml cream or milk']
